location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File 1283/1913 Pts 4 & 5 'MESOPOT: - TRADE. TRADE CORPORATION MISSION. TRADE REPORT'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the volume. Parts 4 and 5 of the subject 1283 (Mesopotamia Trade – British Trade Corporation Mission and Issue of new Trade Report) consists of one volume.

Foliation: the foliation sequence for this description commences at the inside front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 266; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. A previous foliation sequence, which is also circled, has been superseded and therefore crossed out.

mods.abstract: The volume contains parts 4 and 5 of the subject ‘Mesopotamia: Trade’. Part 4 (IOR/L/PS/10/368/1) concerns trade missions to Mesopotamia [Iraq] and the Persian Gulf at the end of the First World War (1914-1918) by the British Trade Corporation and others. Part 5 (IOR/L/PS/12/368/2) concerns the preparation of a new and up to date report on trade conditions in the region.Each part includes a divider which gives the subject and part numbers, the year the subject file was opened, the subject heading, and a list of correspondence references contained in that part by year. This is placed at the back of the correspondence.
